home.title: 6-a-Side Football Platform
home.subtitle: Book pitches, create teams, and compete in leagues across Jordan
home.brandHeadline: Book pitches, play with your team, compete easily
home.brandSubtitle: Book pitches, play with your team, compete easily
home.bookPitchesDesc: Find and book the perfect 6-a-side pitch in your city

home.joinLeaguesDesc: Compete in competitive leagues and track your standings

teams.removeMemberConfirm: Remove this member from the team?

teams.managePlayersDesc: Search for players to add to the team or remove current members
teams.searchPlayers: Search players by name or username...
teams.noSuggestionsDesc: No suggested players at the moment. Try searching for players.

teams.noMembersDesc: No members in the team currently.
teams.memberAddedSuccessDesc: Player has been added to the team successfully

leagues.noLeaguesDesc: Create the first league in your city and start competing!

leagueDetail.lockLeagueSuccess: League locked successfully. You can now generate the schedule.
leagueDetail.needToBeCaptain: You need to be a team captain or member to add teams. Create a team first!
leagueDetail.noStandingsAvailable: No standings available yet. Results will appear here once matches are played.
leagueDetail.lockAndGenerate: Lock the league and generate schedule to see fixtures
leagueDetail.noResultsYet: No results yet. Play matches to see results here.
